lead_paragraph: Jose Iglesias singled through a drawn-in infield to drive in the winning run in the ninth inning, and Detroit improved its record to 9-1, the best in the majors.

headline.print_headline: Close Call Aids Tigers; Nationals Win in Rout
headline.main: Disputed Call Helps Tigers in a Win Over the White Sox

snippet: Jose Iglesias singled through a drawn-in infield to drive in the winning run in the ninth inning, and Detroit improved its record to 9-1, the best in the majors.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Detroit Tigers beat Chicago White Sox, 2-1; other baseball scores noted.
